articles.author: Yash Matange
articles.title: Report: Suyash Mehta set to become first-ever Indian-origin referee to officiate in the NBA - NBA IN
articles.description: Having previously officiated in G League and Summer League games, Suyash Mehta had been named to the league's officiating staff for the first time for the 2019-20 season.
articles.content:
The NBA is set to get its first-ever Indian-origin referee in the upcoming 2020-21 season. 
According to Hoopistani, Suyash Mehta will become the first Indian-origin referee to officiate in the NBA.… [+699 chars]
